title: How to study tax for cs professional - Quora

response.answer_text: If you want to prepare Tax then I would highly recommend you to watch the CA Raj K Agrawal sir video lecture because way of explaining the topic is quiet easy & amazing & his lectures is available on Study At Home site so, because of these online classes you can save your time & as well as you can watch the lectures for numbers of times So, Purchasing these amazing video lecture then must visit StudyAtHome .org  Follow Study At Home on Facebook / Instagram Page. & Before Purchasing these video lecture must visit Study At Home You Tube Channel & get the latest updates related to the courses.

For Tax Preparation I would recommend you to join India’s Top Trusted Online Organization i.e. Study At Home which believes in providing the virtual lectures in the Google Drive/ PenDrive mode by the experienced professionally trained faculties of India because of these online lectures you don’t have to go anywhere you can save your time as well as rest of time you will utilise in your study. For more details visit Study At Home .org on Google Chrome. & Subscribe Study At Home on YouTube Channel.
